name: Jstring
tagline: A Node.js library, designed to simplify work with string validation and sanitization
body:
# jstring [![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/imatveev/jstring.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/imatveev/jstring)
A Node.js library, designed to simplify work with string validation and sanitization. ## Installation npm install jstring ## When should I use jstring? You need deal with string validation or sanitization in your Node.js project. ## API var jstring = require('jstring'); ## Tests ## Examples
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
